divs: sighting detailsit's been ages since a sighting i witnessed but i felt i needed to pass it along. back in 1988 on the outskirts of my home town (titonka, ia), i, along with a friend saw a hovering silver sphere low in the sky over an open field near a tree. we were driving west 3 miles from town and it was to our left. we stopped and both witnessed the object for maybe a couple minutes...it was silent and motionless--it then either shot horizontally in the distance away from us (but not up) or it shrunk in upon itself. it looked similar to a mylar balloon but balloons don't float in mid air then speed away in a clean smooth line. distance from us was approx. 250-300 yards. we both agreed it wasn't just something easily dismissed however my friend denies the possibility of a ufo. i believe it was. this account happened before the widespread sightings of silver spheres in recent years, so influences from tv or news are not a factor in what we saw. given the distance from the road and the height from the ground along with its relationship to the tree, i wouldn't say the object was much larger than a small car, if that. time of sighting was around 3:30pm in september\october. clear visibility.
